and get a quality space”

section-1.para: We focus on products that are elaborately designed and perfecty manufactured through the commercialization of homes and the manufacturing of construction.

section-2.title: Our vision and mission
section-2.header: Movement of culture through commercialization of space
section-2.description:
We have developed a better approach in construction methods, prioritizing certainty in design and ensuring uncompromised quality.

From our self-owned production facilities to project management services and installation sites, our team possesses the knowledge and experience to design and execute modular spaces. Since 2019, we have started supplying doemstically and are currently exporting to international markets, placing customers at the center of this entire process. We aim to redefine the meaning of ‘home’ and create permanent spaces through productization.

section-3.title: Our products
section-3.description:
We envision a future where everyone has a better home. Everyone living in a meticulously designed and well-built dwelling that inspires, functions seamlessly, and considers the environment, we aspire to a world where our living places enhance our lives.

Wavyroom inspires you to reimagine the potential of every site, offering beautiful and flexible spaces tailored to your lifestyle. Whether it’s a second home for relaxation, a guest home for inviting friends and family to share happy moments, or a space for additional income through commercialization, such as offices or F&B ventures, Wavyroom is committed to providing spaces that align with you, both now and in the future.

section-4.title: Our value
section-4.header:
Easy Construction Process
A valuable residential space
section-4.description: Technology has transformed industries, and the construction sector is no exception. We have now created better methods for building homes. We prioritize transparency in pricing and certainty in design, refusing to compromise on quality. We produce a meticulously crafted product - a high-quality “home” with impeccable completion.

list-1.heading: Constant and high quality production
list-1.sub-heading: We produce consistently high-quality homes through Spacewavy's expertise embedded in our self-operated manufacturing facility. Our production line reflects the know-how of Spacewavy, ensuring a consistently high level of quality.

list-2.heading: An outstanding design
list-2.sub-heading: We provide beautiful and functional designs through our R&D organization, comprised of architects, industrial designers, and spatial designers who have been active in the global construction market.

list-3.heading: An outstanding design
list-3.sub-heading: We provide beautiful and functional designs through our R&D organization, comprised of architects, industrial designers, and spatial designers who have been active in the global construction market.

how-to-order.heading:
Create your own space with ease.
Explore the manufacturing process of Wavyroom.

card-1.heading: Advancing the contract
card-1.description: Upon placing an order, based on the estimate generated, a representative will contact you within one day to guide you through the contract process.

card-2.heading: Permit processing
card-2.description: For construction, obtaining permits typically takes around 3 to 6 months. Wavyroom has all the necessary drawings and documents prepared for the permitting process, enabling a faster progression.

card-3.heading: Wavyroom production
card-3.description: After completing the construction filing, we will guide you through the production consent process. Once the earliest possible start date for production is determined, we will communicate the estimated schedule to the customer. *If foundation work is required, a separate estimated schedule will be provided as soon as the earliest start date for production is determined.*For projects requiring basic infrastructure work, please inquire separately, and we will assist you throughout the process.

card-4.heading: Product inspection and shipping
card-4.description: After the completion of the production, a final inspection will be conducted at the Wavyroom factory with the customer.

card-5.heading: Installation
card-5.description: After shipping, the installation will be carried out on-site through the transportation team.

title.text-1: Say goodbye to complicated construction processes and join us for a party at Wavyroom!

faq-1.question: What are the advantages of Wavyroom?
faq-1.answer: Quality: Wavyroom is always manufactured with consistent quality in a factory equipped with facilities and process systems that incorporate Spacewavy’s unique know-how. In particular, high-quality Hyundai Livart and Hyundai L&C materials jointly developed with our investment company, Hyundai Livart, are used in the Wavyroom in areas such as windows, furniture, bathroom, kitchen, and interior finishing materials. Speed: Equipped with a systematic module manufacturing system, we can produce 40 modules per month. The period can be shortened by up to 70% compared to the general construction process. Total solution: Through Spacewavy, you can request project management along with Wavyroom production. To alleviate customer concerns, we manage all areas from 0 to 100, including basic infrastructure construction, architectural office introduction, and landscaping.

faq-2.question: Can Wavyroom be setup anywhere?
faq-2.answer: Wavyroom can be sent and assembled anywhere in the world, but our project management services are only available in South Korea currently. Services will be soon ready in some parts of the United States, including California and Texas.

faq-3.question: How much does it cost for transportation and setup?
faq-3.answer: It depends on the location to which the product is sent. Due to the costs being dependent on the site situation contact us for further information.

faq-4.question: What is Wavyroom’s delivery time?
faq-4.answer: It takes up to four to six weeks for manufacturing of the product. Transportation and setup takes up to a month, depending on your location.

faq-5.question: How many size choices are there?
faq-5.answer: Our main wavyroom product sizes vary from 20m^2 to 30m^2 per module, for other size preferences please contact us via email.

faq-6.question: How is the after-sales services?
faq-6.answer: We have a one-year guarantee on the product free-of-charge. Any product defects caused by the user after setup is not covered by the guarantee.

faq-7.question: Can the module be relocated once it has been setup?
faq-7.answer: The benefits of modular construction is that it can be easily detached from the real estate and moved to another location.

faq-8.question: How are the insulation standards met?
faq-8.answer: The insulation in the modular products sufficiently meet standards in most parts of the world including all areas in South Korea and the United States.
